A_str.description: The python code that creates the A matrix (state matrix).

B_str.description: The python code that creates the B matrix (input matrix).

xi_str.description: The python code that creates the x_i vector (initial state).

xf_str.description: The python code that creates the x_f vector (final state).

Lu_str.description: The python code that creates the Lu vector (input lower bound).

Uu_str.description: The python code that creates the ub scalar (input upper bound).

Lx_str.description: The python code that creates the Lx vector (state lower bound).

Ux_str.description: The python code that creates the Ux vector (state upper bound).
